name: dats-booking
description: Book DATS accessible transit trips with natural language
long_description:
The DATS Booking Assistant helps you book rides for Edmonton's Disabled Adult Transit Service (DATS). Simply tell Claude when and where you want to go.

Features:
- Book trips by saying where and when
- View your upcoming trips
- Cancel bookings
- Check announcements

You need a DATS client account to use this assistant.

Privacy: Your DATS password is never stored. When you connect, a browser opens for you to log in securely. Only a temporary session is saved on your computer.

tools.name: connect_account
tools.description: Connect your DATS account (opens secure login page)

tools.name: disconnect_account
tools.description: Log out of your DATS account

tools.name: get_profile
tools.description: View your profile and saved locations

tools.description: Get DATS fares and service info
